actions.name: Rivalry

cost.trigger: The user attacks a creature that they share a Type with using a Physical- or Special-Category attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user attacks a creature that they share a Type with using a Physical- or Special-Category attack.
Effect: The target takes 20% more damage from the triggering attack.

system.description:
Trigger: The user attacks a creature that they share a Type with using a Physical- or Special-Category attack.
Effect: The target takes 20% more damage from the triggering attack.
